# start(atTime:)

**Instance Method**

Starts playing the pattern at the specified time.

## Declaration

```swift
func start(atTime time: TimeInterval) throws
```

## Parameters

- **time**: The time from which to start playing the pattern.

## Discussion

If `time` is `0` or any value less than the haptic engine’s [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEngine/currentTime], the pattern starts playing immediately. If you call this method on a player that’s already playing, it restarts itself at the beginning of the pattern.

## Starting and Stopping Playback

- **stop(atTime:)**: Stops playing the pattern at the specified time.
- **cancel()**: Stops the pattern player immediately and returns the specified error.
